problem.markdown:
Which statement(s) below are correct about program rules? Select all that apply. (2 attempts)
>>Program rules:<<
[x] A. Allow the interaction with the user based on input. [x] B. Allow you to create and control dynamic behavior of the user interface in the Tracker Capture and Capture apps. [x] C. Expressions are evaluated each time the user interface is displayed and each time a data element is changed.
[explanation] All are correct. [explanation]
